name: KILLBOY (kiriguri)
description: KILLBOY is murder mystery dating sim, where you and a band of misfits team up to find out who is framing killboy for the murdering of idols in MIKI CITY. You meet plenty of cute girls and guys on your adventure, and you have plenty of romantic routes to choose! You can also go on the villains side, perhaps feed into the dark temptation of these idol killings? Everything's on you!!
